name: Beta Instagram 2013 Desktop and Mobile
description:
Install Kiwi Browser and get Tampersmonkey extension to use on the mobile. It works fine! (Till now if Instagram don't change the source-code)
A redesign to instagram like 2013.
additional_info:

+Messenger colors, profile colors working
+Explorer page fonts corrected
+Stories background removed
+Profile page

1.0
